price: 49. Waxaadna arki denbiilayaasha oo Maalintaas iskula xir-xiran silsilado bir ah .
arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ مُّقَرَّنِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَصۡفَادِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: watarā al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin muqarranīna fī al-aṣfādi
